Package dca.gui

Class Summary
AppClock AppClock Class Extends JPanel Implements Runnable This class is a JPanel with a constant redrawing of the current time.
AppInterface AppInterface Class extends JPanel This class contains all visual components of the GUI of this application.
AppWindow AppWindow Class Extends JFrame Implements ActionListener This class is the main window of the application.
AppWindowControl AppWindowControl Class extends JPanel This class is a simple JPanel containing all the window control components, a.k.a.
